knowego.title: EGO — AI
knowego.subtitle: Intelligent Agents. Adaptive Modes. Long-term Memory.
knowego.hero_subtitle: A practical AI agent for analysis and complex tasks. EGO uses Reasoning and Native tool calling to solve problems, not just answer questions. Currently in Beta*.
knowego.hero_highlight: Agent with long-term memory and tools
knowego.hero_description: An AI that shows its thinking process. Simple, transparent and honest about what it can do.
knowego.metrics_2: Analyze long YouTube videos by link.
knowego.metrics_3: Choose any models and providers. Your keys.
knowego.how_step1_desc: EGO understands complex tasks, creates plans and selects needed tools.
knowego.how_step2_desc: See every step: web search, video analysis, code execution, calculations.
knowego.how_step3_desc: Get solution and EGO remembers everything for future tasks without token costs.
knowego.providers_subtitle: Start with our free default provider, powered by Gemini 2.5 Flash. For more power, connect your own API key for providers like OpenAI, Claude, and xAI.
knowego.features_subtitle: An agent with memory, tools, and transparent thinking
knowego.tool_egosearch_desc: Fresh information search from Google API.
knowego.tool_egotube_desc: YouTube video analysis via Gemini for summaries and insights.
knowego.tool_egocodeexec_desc: Python code execution in a safe environment for calculations and analysis.
knowego.tool_egomemory_desc: Search information from past conversations using vector embeddings.
knowego.tool_egocalc_desc: Mathematical calculations with SymPy for complex equations.
knowego.tool_egowiki_desc: Access to encyclopedic Wikipedia knowledge for factual information.
knowego.tool_alterego_desc: Re-analysis of problems from different viewpoints and personas.
knowego.tool_visible_thinking_desc: Observe EGO's full thinking process step-by-step with integrated self-critique.
knowego.tool_multimodal_desc: Process text, images, and files seamlessly for analysis.
knowego.feature_thinking_desc: Watch EGO's reasoning unfold in real-time. See tool selection, decision-making, and problem-solving strategies with complete transparency.
knowego.feature_memory_desc: EGO remembers your projects, preferences, and context across all sessions. No repetitive explanations, just continuous collaboration.
knowego.feature_models_desc: Switch between different LLM providers and models to find the perfect balance of cost, speed, and intelligence for your specific task.
knowego.feature_instructions_desc: Configure agent behavior for each project. Create unique personality and work style.
knowego.feature_persona_desc: Set a role or personality in the system instructions, and EGO will strictly adhere to it in every response, ensuring consistent interaction.
knowego.feature_tools_desc: Analyze videos, search the web, execute code, perform calculations via Native tool calling.
knowego.feature_return_desc: Delegate complex tasks and focus on your work. EGO completes the job and notifies you of results.
knowego.feature_edit_desc: Change your request with one click and get a new response instantly, preserving all context.
knowego.mode_adaptive_desc: Universal mode for any task. AI chooses the best approach to solve.
knowego.mode_deeper_desc: For complex tasks requiring detailed planning and multi-step solutions.
knowego.mode_research_desc: Automatic collection and analysis of information from multiple sources. Ready conclusions instead of links.
knowego.mode_agent_desc: Complete autonomy. Give a goal — get a ready solution with code, documentation, and action plan.
knowego.cta_block_sub: Join the community of innovators already transforming their workflow with EGO's intelligent assistance.
knowego.stats_subtitle: Real-time metrics from our growing community
knowego.footnote: *EGO is currently in Beta. We are actively working on improving its capabilities.
knowego.footnote2: The default EGO provider is free to use. Connecting a third-party LLM provider requires your own API key and is subject to that provider's billing.
knowego.footnote3: EGO's memory is injected into the prompt to maintain context, which consumes tokens on third-party LLM providers.
knowego.footnote4: Analysis is most reliable for videos up to 2 hours, with support for up to 8 hours. Performance may vary.
knowego.demo_different_subtitle: Unlike other AI assistants, EGO shows you exactly how it thinks.
knowego.footer_disclaimer: EGO is an experimental AI in active development. Some features may be experimental or planned for future releases. Built for learning and exploration, not commercial use.
knowego.footer_experiment_description: A personal AI that shows its thinking process.

legal.privacy_tldr_html:
• Your data is your responsibility. You control your data, and we process it only on your instructions for the service to work.
  • What do we process? Your account data, content (messages, files), agent's “Memory”, technical logs for debugging, and login data.
  • Why? For the service to work (our contractual obligation), to improve UX and security (our legitimate interest), and for the long-term “Memory” to function (only with your consent).
  • Third-party services (OpenAI, etc.). If you connect your API key, we send the necessary data to that service. They operate under their own rules. We store your keys in encrypted form.
  • Security. We use encryption (TLS) and the principle of least privilege. But remember, 100% security on the internet does not exist.
  • Data management. You can delete chat history, files, and “Memory”. Operational data is stored as long as necessary. Backups may be stored for up to 90 days.
  • Your rights. You have the right to access, correct, or delete your data. Just write to support.
  • Changes. If we make important changes to this policy, we will notify you.
legal.terms_tldr_html:
• You are the owner of the content. Everything you create and upload (prompts, files) belongs to you.
  • Our right to use. For the service to work (respond to requests, analyze files), you give us a license to process your content. We use it only for the operation of EGO.
  • AI is a tool. The agent's answers may be inaccurate or erroneous. Always double-check important information and do not use EGO to make critical medical, legal, or financial decisions without consulting a specialist.
  • Usage guidelines. Do not use the service for illegal purposes, creating malicious content, attacking the platform, or violating the rights of others.
  • Security. We protect your data, but there is no absolute guarantee. Do not upload confidential information to the service, the leakage of which is critical for you.
  • Account deletion. You can delete your account and all related data from active systems at any time.
  • Consent. By using EGO, you agree to the full version of the rules set out below.
legal.data_title: What data we process and why
legal.privacy_data:
Account data. Your login and authentication information. This is necessary for you to log in securely.

Your content. Messages, uploaded files, metadata, and session structure. This data is necessary to fulfill your requests—so the agent can answer questions and work with files.

Derived data and “Memory”. For some features to work, we create derivative artifacts, such as text excerpts from files or vector representations (embeddings). If you enable the “Memory” feature, we will save embeddings between sessions for personalization and improved search. You can disable and clear “Memory” at any time in the settings.

Telemetry and logs. We collect anonymous technical data: response time, models used, error statuses. This helps us ensure the stability of the service, find and fix errors, and protect against abuse. We do not sell this data, and access to it is strictly limited.
legal.privacy_cookies: We use browser technologies (localStorage, cookies) to store your session token, interface settings (e.g., dark theme), and connection status. This is technical information necessary for comfortable work. You can clear them in your browser settings.
legal.privacy_third_party: When you connect your API key from a third-party provider (e.g., OpenAI), we send that provider the data necessary to process your request (e.g., the prompt text). Further processing is subject to that provider's privacy policy. Your API keys are stored by us in encrypted form and are used only for your requests.
legal.privacy_security:
• All data is protected during transmission using TLS encryption.
  • Your API keys and other sensitive data are stored in encrypted form.
  • Access to data within our system is strictly limited by the principle of least privilege.
  • Despite all measures, complete security on the internet cannot be guaranteed. Please take this into account.
legal.privacy_retention: You have full control over your session history, files, and “Memory” and can delete them at any time. We store operational and technical data for as long as is necessary for the operation of the service and to comply with legal requirements. Data in backups may be stored for up to 90 days before complete deletion.
legal.privacy_rights: You have the right to request access to your data, its correction, or deletion. To do this, contact our support service. For security purposes, we may ask you to confirm your identity.
legal.privacy_changes: We may update this Policy. We will try to notify you of significant changes. By continuing to use EGO after the changes take effect, you agree to the new version.
legal.terms_service: EGO is a platform with an AI agent created for research, analysis, and task execution. Artificial intelligence can make mistakes, so always check important facts.
legal.terms_account: You are responsible for the security of your account and the confidentiality of API keys. Please provide accurate information during registration. You must be at least 16 years old (or another age established by the legislation of your country for consent to the processing of data).
legal.user_content_title: Your content and rights to it
legal.terms_user_content:
The rights remain with you. You retain all rights to the content (messages, files, instructions) that you upload to EGO.

License for the operation of the service. In order for us to provide you with services (for example, to process a file or remember the context of a dialogue), you grant us a non-exclusive, revocable license to store, process, and display your content. This license is valid solely for the purpose of ensuring the operation and improvement of EGO.
legal.terms_fair_use:
It is prohibited to:

  • Violate laws and the rights of third parties.
  • Create or distribute malicious, offensive, or illegal content.
  • Attack our infrastructure (for example, using scraping or automated requests).
  • Use the service to make high-risk decisions (medical, legal) without independent verification by a specialist.

We may introduce technical limits to ensure the stable operation of the platform for all users.
legal.terms_third_party: EGO may use external services through your API keys (OpenAI, Anthropic, etc.). You are solely responsible for the use of these services and the costs associated with them. Their operation is governed by their own terms.
legal.terms_disclaimer: The service is provided “as is”. The results generated by the AI may be inaccurate, incomplete, or biased. We strive for high availability, but do not guarantee uninterrupted operation.
legal.terms_security: We take reasonable technical measures to protect your data, including encryption and access control. However, no system is 100% secure.
legal.termination_title: Termination of access and account deletion
legal.terms_termination: You can delete your account at any time in the settings. We reserve the right to suspend or block your access in case of violation of these rules or for security reasons, with notification where possible.
legal.terms_changes: We may update this Agreement. If the changes are significant, we will try to notify you about it. By continuing to use the service, you accept the new version of the rules.
